**Biomedical and Pharmaceutical Waste Recycling Services**

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites eligible suppliers to submit bids for the provision of biomedical and pharmaceutical waste recycling services. The contract duration is expected to be approximately five years, from September 1, 2023 to August 31, 2028.

**Description of the Requirement**

The CSC requires a supplier to provide a comprehensive waste management system, including collection, transportation, and disposal of biomedical and pharmaceutical waste from its Atlantic regional institutions. The supplier will be responsible for collecting waste from the institutions, transporting it to a designated disposal or processing site, and ensuring that all regulations and laws related to waste management are followed.

** Quantity and Duration of the Contract**

The quantity of services required will be approximately 12 pickups per year at each facility, with an additional 6 pickups per year at the request of the project authority. The contract duration is expected to be approximately five years, with the option to renew for four additional one-year periods.

**Selection Criteria**

The selection criteria are as follows:

* Lowest Price

**Language of Work**

The language of work for this requirement is English.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), and other applicable trade agreements.

**Regions of Opportunity and Delivery**

The regions of opportunity and delivery for this procurement are Atlantic Canada, specifically the provinces of New Brunswick and Nova Scotia.

**Procurement Method**

The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding.

**Tender Closing Date**

The tender closing date is April 18, 2023 at 13:00 Eastern Standard Time.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact:

Sylvie Gallant
Contracting Authority
CSC Regional Headquarters - Atlantic
1045 Main Street
Moncton, New Brunswick E1C 1H1
Telephone: 506-378-8724
Fax: 506-851-6327
Email: [Sylvie.Gallant@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Sylvie.Gallant@csc-scc.gc.ca)

**
